channel.title: Sara's Cooking on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Sara's Cooking on Game6r

item.title: Chocolate Cupcakes Saras Cooking Class
item.description: Experienced chef Sarah invites you into the kitchen to prepare delicious cherry muffins. To do this, here are all the necessary components and tools that will come in handy during cooking. Carefully follow the hints of the game and perform the intended actions in order to end up with delicious cupcakes.

item.title: Saras Cooking Class Caramel Brownie
item.description: Go to the virtual kitchen to make Halloween cupcakes. They will be not only tasty, but also attractive. Follow the hints of the game and process the ingredients correctly. There are several stages here, and you need to try to act as quickly as possible in order to get bonus points.

item.title: Saras Cooking Class Upside Down Cake
item.description: Bake a delicious pie with fruit! An experienced chef Sarah will help you with this. After starting the game, you will enter the kitchen, where the ingredients necessary for baking have already been collected. You just have to process them correctly, following the game prompts. Try to achieve a delicious result as quickly as possible.

item.title: Spinach Rotolo Saras Cooking Class
item.description: In this game, you have to cook a funny dinner that kids will definitely like. There is nothing complicated in the recipe, and hints constantly appear on the screen, which helps to cope with the process. Go to the virtual kitchen to try on the role of a chef and get a really mouth-watering result.
